Room.Name: Nobunaga's Flea Market
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a bustling flea market owned by Nobunaga.
Room.LongDescription: There are several tents around you, and a number of sellers have open-air tables set up. Sellers and buyers crowd around, trying to get the best bargains. Nobunaga has a large tent to the south, and he takes a cut of all the sales that happen here. If you would like to trade or swap some armor, or a nice weapon, you should contact Nobunaga the orc.
